transformations.name: RemoveColumns1
transformations.description: Généré automatiquement par les actions d'aperçu de données

transformations.name: RemoveColumns3
transformations.description: Généré automatiquement par les actions d'aperçu de données

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{affecte/non_affecte} as string,
		{plateforme/vente directe} as string,
		{origine de la ligne} as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		{Code client livré} as string,
		{code client plateforme livree} as string,
		{code produit} as string,
		quantite as string,
		ca as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque as string,
		marque_code as string,
		canal_distribution_final as string,
		{nom du canal} as string,
		canal_final as string,
		document_vente as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrigé (vente directe)} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre (vente directe)} as string,
		{Facture (vente directe)} as string,
		{Type poste Facture (vente directe)} as string,
		no_offre as string,
		{ATC offre} as string,
		{ATC livré} as string,
		{ATC Performance} as string,
		NomATC as string,
		DR as string,
		Matricule as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		N1groupe as string,
		N2groupe as string,
		N3groupe as string,
		N4groupe as string,
		N5groupe as string,
		N6groupe as string,
		N7groupe as string,
		N1groupedesignation as string,
		N2groupedesignation as string,
		N3groupedesignation as string,
		N4groupedesignation as string,
		N5groupedesignation as string,
		N6groupedesignation as string,
		N7groupedesignation as string,
		N1localedesignation as string,
		N2localedesignation as string,
		N3localedesignation as string,
		N4localedesignation as string,
		N5localedesignation as string,
		N6localedesignation as string,
		N7localedesignation as string,
		N1locale as string,
		N2locale as string,
		N3locale as string,
		N4locale as string,
		N5locale as string,
		N6locale as string,
		N7locale as string,
		{Hiérarchgroupe} as string,
		{Hiérarchlocale} as string,
		{Numéro du compte} as string,
		{EPS_Nom du compte} as string,
		{EPS_Groupe cible/Typologie générale} as string,
		{EPS_Sous groupe cible/Typologie détaillée} as string,
		{EPS_Compte principal: Numéro du compte} as string,
		{EPS_Compte principal: Nom du compte} as string,
		Client as string,
		{Numéro client indirect} as string,
		CODE_CMI as string,
		NOM_CMI as string,
		{Nom du compte} as string,
		{Client Indirect_ Groupe cible/Typologie générale} as string,
		{Client Indirect_ Sous groupe cible/Typologie détaillée} as string,
		{Client Indirect_  Compte principal: Numéro du compte} as string,
		{Client Indirect_  Compte principal: Nom du compte} as string,
		{Client Direct - Hiérarchie N1 SAP } as string,
		{Client Direct - Hiérarchie N2 SAP } as string,
		{Client Indirect - Hiérarchie N1 SAP} as string,
		{Client Indirect - Hiérarchie N2 SAP} as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		{ATC Corrigé} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> InputBaseCom
source(output(
		{Référence article} as string,
		{Grande famille} as string,
		{Sous-famille} as string,
		{eShop level 1 - CATALOG - désignation} as string,
		{eShop level 2 - RANGE - désignation} as string,
		{eShop level 3 - FAMILY - désignation} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> HierarchieMKTSD
source(output(
		{Référence article active} as string,
		{Grande famille} as string,
		{Sous-famille} as string,
		{eShop level 1} as string,
		{eShop level 2} as string,
		{eShop level 3} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> HerarchieMKTVA
source(output(
		DateOffre as string,
		{Date Prev Cde} as string,
		{Code projet} as string,
		Projet as string,
		Type as string,
		{CP projet} as string,
		{Ville projet} as string,
		NbLogement as string,
		{Référence} as string,
		Marque as string,
		Famille as string,
		Produit as string,
		{Quantité} as string,
		{Prix de base} as string,
		{Prix client} as string,
		{Prix négoce} as string,
		{Prix total} as string,
		Client as string,
		{Type financement} as string,
		{Ville client} as string,
		{Numéro interne 1} as string,
		{Négoce} as string,
		{Ville négoce} as string,
		{Numéro interne 2} as string,
		{Statut offre} as string,
		Responsable as string,
		Groupe as string,
		Offre as string,
		{Date de maj statut} as string,
		{Numéro avant vente} as string,
		{Créateur offre} as string,
		{Commentaire interne} as string,
		{Offre dérogée} as string,
		{Contrat cadre} as string,
		{Typologie projet} as string,
		DateValidite as string,
		DEEE as string,
		OffreSupprimee as string,
		Canal as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> StgOffreChantier
source(output(
		OrgCm as string,
		CDis as string,
		Article as string,
		Description as string,
		{Hiérarch.groupe} as string,
		{Hiérarch.locale} as string,
		Predecessor as string,
		Successor as string,
		St as string,
		{Désignation Statut} as string,
		{Déb. val.} as string,
		{N1.groupe} as string,
		{N2.groupe} as string,
		{N3.groupe} as string,
		{N4.groupe} as string,
		{N5.groupe} as string,
		{N6.groupe} as string,
		{N7.groupe} as string,
		{N1.locale} as string,
		{N2.locale} as string,
		{N3.locale} as string,
		{N4.locale} as string,
		{N5.locale} as string,
		{N6.locale} as string,
		{N7.locale} as string,
		{N1.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N2.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N3.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N4.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N5.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N6.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N7.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N1.locale.designation} as string,
		{N2.locale.designation} as string,
		{N3.locale.designation} as string,
		{N4.locale.designation} as string,
		{N5.locale.designation} as string,
		{N6.locale.designation} as string,
		{N7.locale.designation} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ArticleHierarchi
source(output(
		{Numéro du compte} as string,
		{Nom du compte} as string,
		{Groupe cible/Typologie générale} as string,
		{Sous groupe cible/Typologie détaillée} as string,
		{Compte principal: Numéro du compte} as string,
		{Compte principal: Nom du compte} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> typologieEPS
source(output(
		Marque as string,
		{Code Postal début} as string,
		{Code Postal fin} as string,
		Utilisateur as string,
		Fonction as string,
		{Département} as string,
		ATC as string,
		NomATC as string,
		{Plan primes} as string,
		Matricule as string,
		{Canal final} as string,
		toreplicate as string,
		dd as string,
		DR as string,
		{Code postal} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
InputBaseCom select(mapColumn(
		{Typologie client direct} = {Code client livré},
		yearmonth,
		canal_final,
		{Typologie client indirect} = {code client plateforme livree},
		{Code article} = {code produit},
		{Quantité} = quantite,
		{CA net} = ca,
		marque,
		{Canal de distribution} = {nom du canal},
		no_offre,
		{Hiérarchgroupe},
		{ATC Performance},
		DR,
		N1groupedesignation,
		N2groupedesignation,
		N3groupedesignation,
		N4groupedesignation,
		N5groupedesignation,
		N6groupedesignation,
		N7groupedesignation
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Map
Map derive({Typologie client indirect} = iif({Typologie client indirect}=={Typologie client direct}, 
 "", 
 {Typologie client indirect}),
		temp = "left") ~> TypologieClientIndirect
HierarchieMKTSD derive(marque = "SaunierDuval") ~> marqueSaunier
HerarchieMKTVA derive(marque = "Vaillant") ~> marqueVaillant
marqueSaunier select(mapColumn(
		{Référence article},
		{eShop level 1 - CATALOG - désignation},
		{eShop level 2 - RANGE - désignation},
		{eShop level 3 - FAMILY - désignation},
		marque
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumns
marqueVaillant select(mapColumn(
		{Référence article} = {Référence article active},
		{eShop level 1 - CATALOG - désignation} = {eShop level 1},
		{eShop level 2 - RANGE - désignation} = {eShop level 2},
		{eShop level 3 - FAMILY - désignation} = {eShop level 3},
		marque
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumns2
dropColumns, dropColumns2 union(byName: true)~> UnionMKT
TypologieClientIndirect, UnionMKTR join(Map@marque == UnionMKT@marque
	&& {Code article} == {Référence article},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Joindre1
TypologieClientIndirect, UnionMKT join({Code article} == {Référence article}
	&& Map@marque == UnionMKT@marque,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerMKT
RemoveColumns3 filter(canal_final=="Diffus") ~> FiltreCanalDiffusTrue
RemoveColumns3 filter(canal_final!="Diffus") ~> FiltreCanalDiffusFalse
FiltreCanalDiffusFalse filter(canal_final=="Chantier") ~> FiltreCanalChantierTrue
FiltreCanalDiffusFalse filter(canal_final!="Chantier") ~> FiltrerCanalChantierFalse
Filter1 aggregate(groupBy(Offre,
		{Référence}),
	{Code projet} = max({Code projet}),
		{Typologie projet} = max({Typologie projet})) ~> UniqueStgOffreChantier
NoOffreVide derive({Typologie offre si diffus} = substring(no_offre,1,3)) ~> TypologieOffreSIdiffus
JoinStgCanalChantieTrue, TypologieOffreSIdiffus, RemoveColumns1, FiltrerCanalChantierFalse union(byName: true)~> UnionALL
UniqueStgOffreChantier, FiltreCanalChantierTrue join(Offre == no_offre
	&& {Référence} == {Code article},
	joinType:'right',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinStgCanalChantieTrue
FiltreCanalDiffusTrue derive(no_offre = iifNull(no_offre, "", no_offre)) ~> NoOffreVide
FiltreLeft select(mapColumn(
		{Typologie client direct},
		canal_final,
		{Typologie client indirect},
		{Code article},
		{Quantité},
		{CA net},
		{Canal de distribution},
		no_offre,
		yearmonth,
		DR,
		{ATC Performance},
		{Hiérarchgroupe},
		N1groupedesignation,
		N2groupedesignation,
		N3groupedesignation,
		N4groupedesignation,
		N5groupedesignation,
		N6groupedesignation,
		N7groupedesignation,
		{Référence article},
		{eShop level 1 - CATALOG - désignation},
		{eShop level 2 - RANGE - désignation},
		{eShop level 3 - FAMILY - désignation},
		marque = UnionMKT@marque
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveColumns1
UnionMKT derive(temp = "right") ~> UnionMKTR
Joindre1 filter(isNull(UnionMKTR@temp)) ~> FiltreLeft
innerMKT select(mapColumn(
		{Typologie client direct},
		canal_final,
		{Typologie client indirect},
		{Code article},
		{Quantité},
		{CA net},
		{Canal de distribution},
		no_offre,
		yearmonth,
		DR,
		{ATC Performance},
		{Hiérarchgroupe},
		N1groupedesignation,
		N2groupedesignation,
		N3groupedesignation,
		N4groupedesignation,
		N5groupedesignation,
		N6groupedesignation,
		N7groupedesignation,
		temp,
		{Référence article},
		{eShop level 1 - CATALOG - désignation},
		{eShop level 2 - RANGE - désignation},
		{eShop level 3 - FAMILY - désignation}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveColumns3
ArticleHierarchi aggregate(groupBy(Article),
	Description = max(Description),
		N1groupe = max({N1.groupe}),
		N2groupe = max({N2.groupe}),
		N3groupe = max({N3.groupe}),
		N4groupe = max({N4.groupe}),
		N5groupe = max({N5.groupe}),
		N6groupe = max({N6.groupe}),
		N7groupe = max({N7.groupe})) ~> UniqueArticle
UnionALL, UniqueArticle join({Code article} == Article,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinUniqueArticle
JoinUniqueArticle select(mapColumn(
		{Code article},
		{Description article} = Description,
		{eShop level 1 - CATALOG - désignation},
		{eShop level 2 - RANGE - désignation},
		{eShop level 3 - FAMILY - désignation},
		N1groupe,
		N1groupedesignation,
		N2groupe,
		N2groupedesignation,
		N3groupe,
		N3groupedesignation,
		N4groupe,
		N4groupedesignation,
		N4groupe = N5groupe,
		N5groupedesignation,
		N6groupe,
		N6groupedesignation,
		N7groupe,
		N7groupedesignation,
		{Quantité},
		{CA net},
		{Typologie client direct},
		{Typologie client indirect},
		{Canal de distribution},
		{Typologie offre si diffus},
		{Typologie projet},
		yearmonth,
		DR,
		{ATC Performance},
		{Hiérarchgroupe}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectLast
StgOffreChantier filter(!isNull(Offre)) ~> Filter1
typologieEPS select(mapColumn(
		{Numéro du compte},
		{Groupe cible/Typologie générale}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> typologieEPSKeepColumns
typologieEPSKeepColumns derive({Numéro du compte} = replace({Numéro du compte}, "x", "")) ~> deleteXinCompte
deleteXinCompte derive({Numéro du compte} = toString(toInteger({Numéro du compte}))) ~> delete00inCompte
SelectLast, delete00inCompte join({Typologie client direct} == {Numéro du compte},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> typologieClientDirect
renameTypologieClientDirect, delete00inCompte join({Typologie client indirect} == {Numéro du compte},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> typologieClientIndirectGroupe
typologieClientDirect select(mapColumn(
		{Code article},
		{Description article},
		{eShop level 1 - CATALOG - désignation},
		{eShop level 2 - RANGE - désignation},
		{eShop level 3 - FAMILY - désignation},
		N1groupe,
		N1groupedesignation,
		N2groupe,
		N2groupedesignation,
		N3groupe,
		N3groupedesignation,
		N4groupe,
		N4groupedesignation,
		N5groupedesignation,
		N6groupe,
		N6groupedesignation,
		N7groupe,
		N7groupedesignation,
		{Quantité},
		{CA net},
		{Typologie client indirect},
		{Canal de distribution},
		{Typologie offre si diffus},
		{Typologie projet},
		{Typologie client direct} = {Groupe cible/Typologie générale},
		yearmonth,
		DR,
		{ATC Performance},
		{Hiérarchgroupe}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameTypologieClientDirect
typologieClientIndirectGroupe select(mapColumn(
		{Code article},
		{Description article},
		{eShop level 1 - CATALOG - désignation},
		{eShop level 2 - RANGE - désignation},
		{eShop level 3 - FAMILY - désignation},
		N1groupe,
		N1groupedesignation,
		N2groupe,
		N2groupedesignation,
		N3groupe,
		N3groupedesignation,
		N4groupe,
		N4groupedesignation,
		N5groupedesignation,
		N6groupe,
		N6groupedesignation,
		N7groupe,
		N7groupedesignation,
		{Quantité},
		{CA net},
		{Typologie client direct},
		{Typologie client indirect} = {Groupe cible/Typologie générale},
		{Canal de distribution},
		{Typologie offre si diffus},
		{Typologie projet},
		Date = yearmonth,
		DR,
		{ATC Performance},
		{code article "groupe"} = {Hiérarchgroupe}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameTypologieClientIndirect
renameTypologieClientIndirect sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Column_12 as string,
		Column_13 as string,
		Column_14 as string,
		Column_15 as string,
		Column_16 as string,
		Column_17 as string,
		Column_18 as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['SORTIE_MARKETING.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> Smarketing
